eventDescription: Kubernetes Community Days Chennai 2025 is a community-organized conference supported by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) to help grow and sustain the Kubernetes and cloud-native community in Chennai. It gathers adopters and technologists from open source and cloud-native communities for education, collaboration, and networking.
We're excited to invite you to the first Platform Engineering Meetup in Coimbatore!
eventVenue: Humbletree Cloud Private Limited, DVP Towers, Coimbatore

eventName: MongoDB User Group Chennai: April Meetup - The AI Awakens
eventDescription: Join us for an exciting in-person meetup where we explore the power of AI and MongoDB! Whether you're a developer, data enthusiast, or just curious about the intersection of AI and databases, this is the perfect place to learn, network, and grow.
